Question
========

The distribution of water requirements (in liters) during a flight from Amsterdam to New York has an average of 3 liters per passenger and a variation of 1.6. Suppose you take a random flight with 250 passengers, what is the average water requirement in this sample?

Answerlist
----------

* 3 liters
* 125 liters
* 250 liters
* 750 liters

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3 liters: Correct
* 125 liters: Incorrect
* 250 liters: Incorrect
* 750 liters: Incorrect
